title: Kirby Cuttings Garden Services
xml:
<map name="1921102" theme="dark-prism" version="tango"><topic central="true" text="Kirby Cuttings Garden Services" id="1"><topic position="421,-104" order="0" id="2"><text><![CDATA[5 Champion Road Kingswood Bristol BS15 4SU United Kingdom
07791 067 838
https://kirbycuttings.co.uk/
info@kirbycuttings.co.uk

Kirby Cuttings Garden Services, developed in 2013 by the company owner, Callum, 
has a wealth of industry experience extending over 12 years. Before embarking on 
this business journey, Callum had a successful tenure with a prominent landscaping 
company in Bristol, where he sharpened his skills. In addition, his background in art 
and design from university significantly informs his garden design capacities, 
gaining him extensive evaluations across the multiple platforms. The considerable 
checklist of pleased, repeat clients stands as a testimony to the top quality of job 
provided. The core services provided by Kirby Cuttings encompass Garden Design, 
extensive Garden Makeovers, Groundwork, Driveway Installation, and Fencing 
Installation. At Kirby Cuttings Garden Services, our goal is securely rooted in 
integrity, honesty, high quality, and remarkable client care in the field of 
landscaping within Bristol. If you've had less-than-pleasant experiences with other 
organisations in the past, we are dedicated to rekindling your trust in landscaping 
companies.

]]></text></topic></topic></map>
